Package bdd.entitiesManagers

Class StockManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • bdd.entitiesManagers.Manager
      • bdd.entitiesManagers.StockManager
  • public class StockManager
extends Manager
    Contains static methods for selection, inserting, updating, and removing stock in the database
